system.descriptor: Plot a Course between two points, be it across a continent or through the Warp. Successful test provides estimated navigation time, cosmography, conditions, weather, warp tides, and so on. Often makes use of maps, charts, or Innate Abilities.
system.uses:
Skill Test: Spend 1 Minute to Find Current Position or location as long as not in the warp. Difficulty varies on map quality, landmarks, etc.
Skill Test: Spend Several hours plotting a course via plotting maps, calculating trajectories, and so on. Difficulty varies on map quality, landmarks, etc.
Skill Groups: Surface, Steller, Warp (Note: Warp Navigation is done by Navigators, needed for ship to find its way in the warp, has special rules)
